mapper.select: SELECT u.id , u.user_name , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , u.resource_id , u.phone_number , u.full_name , au."name" as "authority_name" , au."id" as "authority_id" FROM user_ as u LEFT JOIN users_authorities as ua on u."id" = ua.user_id LEFT JOIN authority as au on au."id" = ua.authority_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName};

SELECT u.id , u.user_name , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , u.resource_id , u.phone_number , u.full_name , au."name" as "authority_name" , au."id" as "authority_id" FROM user_ as u LEFT JOIN users_authorities as ua on u."id" = ua.user_id LEFT JOIN authority as au on au."id" = ua.authority_id WHERE u.id = #{userId};

SELECT id , account_expired as "accountExpired" , account_locked as "accountLocked" , credentials_expired as "credentialsExpired" , enabled , user_name , status , full_name as "fullName" , gender , date_birth as "dateBirth" , phone_number as "phoneNumber" , resource_id as "resourceId" , is_online as "isOline" , is_first_login as "isFirstLogin" , remark , address , role_id as "roleId" FROM user_ WHERE user_name = #{userName};

SELECT id , account_expired as "accountExpired" , account_locked as "accountLocked" , credentials_expired as "credentialsExpired" , enabled , user_name as "userName" , status , create_date as "createAt" , create_by as "createBy" , full_name as "fullName" , gender , date_birth as "dateBirth" , phone_number as "phoneNumber" , resource_id as "resourceId" , is_first_login as "isFirstLogin" , remark , address , role_id as "roleId" FROM user_ where status != #{status} and id != #{id} order by id DESC;

SELECT u.id , u.first_name as "firstName" , u.last_name as "lastName" , u.user_name as "userName" , u.date_birth as "dateBirth" , u.gender , u.resource_id as "resourceID" , u.phone_number as "phoneNumber" , u.other_phone_number as "otherPhoneNumber" , u.create_date as "createDate" , u.address , u.user_name as "userName" FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = #{userID}
